detaileddescription.para: Unused default value.
This topic type corresponds to $aws/things/<thing-name>/shadow/get, publishing an empty message to this topic requests the device shadow document.
This topic type corresponds to $aws/things/<thing-name>/shadow/update, publishing data to this topic updates the device shadow document.
This topic type corresponds to $aws/things/<thing-name>/shadow/delete, publishing an empty message to this topic deletes the device Shadow document.

briefdescription.para: AWS IoT shadow topics, used in messages to specify which shadow topic that will be published to.

detaileddescription.para: @ AWS broker disconnect results.
Connecting to AWS IoT broker.
Connected to AWS IoT broker.
AWS IoT library has subscribed to all configured topics.
Disconnected to AWS IoT broker.
Data received from AWS message broker.
Acknowledgment for data sent to AWS IoT.
Acknowledgment for pings sent to AWS IoT.
FOTA update start.
FOTA update done, request to reboot.
FOTA erase pending.
FOTA erase done.
FOTA progress notification.
FOTA error. Used to propagate FOTA-related errors to the application. This is to distinguish between AWS_IOT irrecoverable errors and FOTA errors, so they can be handled differently.
AWS IoT library irrecoverable error.

briefdescription.para: AWS IoT notification event types, used to signal the application.
AWS IoT library asynchronous event handler.

parameterdescription.para: The event and any associated parameters.

simplesect.para: This API must be called exactly once, and it must return successfully.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to struct containing connection parameters.
Pointer to event handler to receive AWS IoT module events.

simplesect.para: 0 If successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Connect to the AWS IoT broker.

detaileddescription.para: This function exposes the MQTT socket to main so that it can be polled on.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to struct containing connection parameters, the MQTT connection socket number will be copied to the socket entry of the struct.

simplesect.para: 0 If successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Disconnect from the AWS IoT broker.

simplesect.para: 0 If successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Send data to AWS IoT broker.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to struct containing data to be transmitted to the AWS IoT broker.

simplesect.para: 0 If successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Get data from AWS IoT broker.

simplesect.para: 0 If successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Ping AWS IoT broker. Must be called periodically to keep connection to broker alive.

simplesect.para: 0 If successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Add a list of application specific topics that will be subscribed to upon connection to AWS IoT broker.

parameterdescription.para: Number of entries in the list.

simplesect.para: 0 If successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.
